name: Welcome to Macintester
description:
Perennially haunted by my first computer experiences with my father's old (then-current) Macintosh, and having recently been a subject for a psychological research study, I combined these elements into this game. 

Different musical tracks and the possibility of different scores make replaying this, or sharing it with a friend,  an intriguing choice!

Credits: ChiKarego2 and FindersKeepers fonts by Giles Booth, based on Susan Kare's original Geneva font for Macintosh. Design elements and icons/animations by Susan Kare (I recreated them by hand). Buy prints of Susan's iconic icons at kareprints.com. Rorschach images sourced from rorschach.org. Wikipedia informs me that they are in public domain. Feelings questions/format lifted from the study I was in. "Heartbreak Hotel" by Elvis Aaron Presley / Mae Boren Axton / Thomas R. Durden. "1st Gymnopedie" by Erik Satie. "Sonata Quasi Una Fantasia ("Moonlight") by Ludwig van Beethoven. I can't stop making goofy mashups! Other musical compositions are my own.  Made in Chris Maltby's GB Studio.

(This is somewhat of an homage/parody, but I don't know if using these existing and  copyrighted elements may disqualify me from the Game Boy Showdown 2022 jam. However, I am the one who did all the work in editing, formatting, simplifying, and arranging these elements for use in GB Studio.)
